## CredentialManager.getCredentialsFromCookie() method

Retrieves credential data from a browser cookie.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getCredentialsFromCookie(): CredentialData | undefined;
```
**Returns:**

[CredentialData](./foundation-comms.credentialdata_2.md) \| undefined

The retrieved credential data, or `undefined` if no matching data was found.
